title: 服务器突然奔溃 无法启动
author: 红尘如狱
txt_content:

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
看样子是个实体出错 MD是AM2
坐标是World: (-489,71,454) 
找到config文件夹 forge.cfg 将removeErroringEntities=true emoveErroringTileEntities=true 这两项移除错误实体打开 看能不能启动起来

另外不要把
journeymap 小地图
ArmorStatusHUD 耐久显示
WailaHarvestability 信息提示
这种玩意装到服务端

replies.author: 红尘如狱
replies.txt_content:
HTL9257 发表于 2019-4-26 00:00
看样子是个实体出错 MD是AM2
坐标是World: (-489,71,454) 
找到config文件夹 forge.cfg 将removeErroringEn ...
什么叫移除错误实体打开 另外我这个文件里代码是这样的
# Set this to true to remove any Entity that throws an error in its update method instead of closing the server and reporting a crash log. BE WARNED THIS COULD SCREW UP EVERYTHING USE SPARINGLY WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR DAMAGES.
    B:removeErroringEntities=false

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
红尘如狱 发表于 2019-4-26 00:16
什么叫移除错误实体打开 另外我这个文件里代码是这样的
# Set this to true to remove any Entity that t ...
把这两个项目改成true 默认是false

replies.author: 红尘如狱
replies.txt_content:
HTL9257 发表于 2019-4-26 00:00
看样子是个实体出错 MD是AM2
坐标是World: (-489,71,454) 
找到config文件夹 forge.cfg 将removeErroringEn ...
我将配置文件里的这两个代码改成true了 还是开不起来

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 HTL9257 于 2019-4-26 00:29 编辑 
红尘如狱 发表于 2019-4-26 00:22
我将配置文件里的这两个代码改成true了 还是开不起来
先把那些不该装在服务端的MOD清除了 再尝试更新AM2 
https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/ars-magica-2/files?filter-game-version=2020709689%3A4449最新版是1.40-009版本
